name: Honeywell Cool Moisture Humidifier, Medium Room, 1 Gallon Tank, White – Invisible Moisture Humidifier for Baby, Kids, Adult Bedrooms – Quiet and Easy to Clean with UV Technology for Everyday Comfort
short_description: CLEANER INVISIBLE MOISTURE – Honeywell Cool Moisture Humidifier effectively brings invisible moisture to your home. It utilizes UV technology and a wicking filter to help treat the water and capture minerals to keep them out of the air for a cleaner mist. EVERYDAY COMFORT – This humidifier for home features evaporative technology that increases and holds the targeted humidity level to optimize moisture in the room. It’s ideal for everyday comfort and year-round relief from dry throat and dry, itchy skin. EASY TO USE – Featuring a large 1.1 gallon, easy-fill, self-standing tank, this cool moisture humidifier provides up to 24 hours of run time. Plus, it’s easy to clean – all parts that touch water can be cleaned in the dishwasher. HUMIDIFIER FOR BEDROOM – As the ideal humidifier for baby, this device has a soft, fan-like sound to add restful noise to any room. Great for an adult or child’s bedroom, the large tank can run overnight, providing consistent soothing moisture. COMPATIBLE DOES NOT MEAN COMPARABLE – For best performance, use only a genuine Honeywell Replacement Wicking Filter A. Compatible humidifier filter replacements are not guaranteed to offer the same performance or efficiency.
product_description: Honeywell Cool Moisture Humidifier is an easy way to bring invisible moisture to your home. Designed to bring you everyday comfort, it will add invisible moisture to the air to soothe a dry throat and dry, itchy skin caused by a heater, air conditioner or dry air climates. It’s a cool moisture humidifier with evaporative technology that increases, stops, and holds the targeted humidity level to optimize moisture in the room. UV technology helps treat the water for a cleaner mist, while the wicking filter captures minerals from the water to keep them out of the air. Featuring a large, 1.1 gallon, easy-fill, self-standing tank, this Honeywell humidifier provides up to 24 hours of run time, meaning it can run overnight without needing a refill. It’s the perfect humidifier for bedrooms, with a soft, fan-like sound to add restful noise to any room. Plus, it’s easy to clean as all parts that touch water are dishwasher safe. For best performance, use only a Genuine Honeywell Replacement Wicking Filter A. Compatible humidifier filter replacements are not guaranteed to offer the same performance or efficiency.

name: BREEZOME 6L Humidifiers for Bedroom Large Room & Essential Oil Diffuser, Ultrasonic Top Fill Cool Mist Humidifiers for Baby, Plants, Nursery Last up to 60 Hours, Smart Humidistat Control, Quiet, Black
short_description: POWERFUL HUMIDIFICATION, PERFECT FOR BEDROOM & BABY ROOM: Our ultrasonic humidifier has a 6L (1.6 gallon) large tank that works great in large rooms up to 500 sq feet. It allows a long lasting humidification for up to 60 hours. DIFFUSER & HUMIDIFIER 2 IN 1: Add your favourite essential oils to the built-in aromatherapy tray, the cool mist humidifier can mix your favourite aroma with the moist air and fill your room with relaxing aroma. AUTOMATICALLY CONTROL THE HUMIDITY LEVEL: Our humidifiers for bedroom is designed with a intelligent humidistat which helps to maintain the pre-set humidity level and allows you to check the real time humidity level. Just setup your preferred humidity level and let our humidifier do the rest. CONVENIENT TOP FILL DESIGN: Easily clean the water tank under running water with a detachable tank. It’s never been easier to maintain water in the tank. Just open the lid and directly add water into the working humidifier. WHISPER-QUIET & SAFE: Designed with a quiet sleep mode, our humidifier can work in low noise to protect your undisturbed good sleep. It would automatically shut off when water runs out. Safe for you and your whole family.

Demineralization cartridge effectively prevents the generation of limescale and white dust (search for dreo demineralization cartridge). name: raydrop 2.2L Humidifiers for Bedroom, Cool Mist Humidifiers with Timer, Digital Knob, 26dB Quiet Small Humidifier for Baby, Nursery and Plants with Night Light, 30 Hours Runtime, Easy to Fill & Clean
short_description: Quick Response, Reliable Control: (September 2024 New Upgrade) Say goodbye to touch anxiety, just rotate with the intuitive digital display knob, you can quickly adjust the humidifier settings by rotating it to select from 3 different mist levels and “-” (off). For added convenience, rotate counterclockwise to set a timer for up to 9 hours, ensuring precise control and customization that's tailored to your preferences. Clearly Visible, Potent Humidification: Experience robust humidification with a maximum mist output of 230ml/h, ensuring optimal moisture levels in bedrooms, nurseries, and offices. Not only is the powerful mist visible, but also the status of the humidifier, including mist level, timer, and water level, providing enhanced visibility and control. Double Security, Extra Protection: Incorporates both a 0-9 hour timer for automatic shutdown and water shortage auto shut-off for enhanced safety and peace of mind. Crafted with double-layer material, guaranteeing durability and a premium feel. Ideal for Bedroom Use: Experience tranquility with our humidifier's ultra-quiet 28dB operation, ensuring peaceful sleep. The digital display, designed for convenience, automatically turns off after 180 seconds of inactivity, conserving energy. Plus, elevate your space with the optional colorful light feature, adding a touch of ambiance to your nighttime routine. Longtime Humidify & 3 Mist Levels: Our humidifier, boasting a 2.2L tank capacity, delivers uninterrupted moisture for up to 30 hours, ensuring a cozy atmosphere in any room. Tailor Your Comfort: With three levels of mist adjustment, meet your unique comfort needs with ease. Effortless Maintenance: Designed for Your Convenience, Raydrop Features a Spacious 3.74 Inches Opening for Easy Cleaning and Refilling. Enhance Your User Experience and Ensure Hassle-Free Operation for Long-Term Use. 5-Year Warranty: Rest Assured with Our Comprehensive Five-Year Warranty, Providing Long-Term Protection for Your Purchase. Count on Our Dedicated Customer Support Team to Assist You Every Step of the Way, Ensuring Your Peace of Mind and Satisfaction.

name: Humidifier for Bedroom, 2.5L Cool Mist Humidifier with Essential Oils Diffuser and Nightlight, Top Fill Humidifiers for Home, Auto Shut-off
short_description: Long-Lasting Hydration & Automatic Shut-Off: Equipped with a 2.5L large tank, this humidifier delivers up to 25 hours of continuous, soothing mist, helping to ease you into a restful sleep while alleviating congestion and dry throat; the automatic shut-off feature ensures safety and peace of mind, turning the device off when water levels are low Top-Fill Design for Easy Refills: Forget the hassle of flipping your humidifier upside down; the top-fill design makes refilling the tank straightforward and spill-free, ensuring you can maintain optimal humidity levels with ease Whisper-Quiet Operation and Sleep Mode: With noise levels as low as 24dB, the humidifiers for home operate quietly, making it the perfect choice for bedrooms and nurseries; the sleep mode turns off all lights, ensuring an undisturbed night's rest under the most serene condition Colorful Night Light: Choose from 7 soft, rotating colors or set a single color to enhance the ambiance of your room; the LED lights can also serve as a gentle night light, perfect for creating a calming environment before bedtime 12-month Warranty: At Clarston, we pride ourselves on providing top-notch customer service; our team is dedicated to ensuring your satisfaction and is always ready to assist with any questions or concerns regarding your humidifier

name: Vicks CoolRelief Cool Mist Humidifier Small to Medium Room Vaporizer for Baby, Kids, Adults, 1.2 Gal
short_description: Vicks portable humidifiers are quick and easy to use and require no replacement filters. The 1.2-gallon tank provides cool mist up to 40 hours with an auto shut-off feature for your convenience. This vaporizer humidifier provides symptomatic relief from cough and congestion during cold and flu season, during allergy season or whenever you're experiencing dry air discomfort. Vicks humidifiers are quiet, making them bedroom essentials for babies, kids and adults. Experience the Vicks Difference. Use Vicks VapoSteam or Vicks VapoPads in your air humidifier for extra soothing comfort. Vicks humidifiers, vaporizers and steam inhalers help you breathe better and sleep more comfortably.
product_description: For cough and congestion relief for babies, kids and adults, rely on a brand you trust. The Vicks CoolRelief Cool Mist Humidifier can help provide symptomatic relief of cough and congestion from cold, flu, allergies or dry air discomfort. A must-have baby essential, Vicks vaporizers are also ideal for older kids and adults and can help maintain proper humidity levels in your home. Indoor humidity levels between 40-60% can help keep throat and nasal passages hydrated to temporarily relieve dryness and discomfort, while also reducing static electricity and keeping plants healthier –– no need to purchase a separate plant humidifier. With no filter, this room humidifier is quick and easy to use and clean. Perfect for medium-size rooms, the 1.2 gallon tank provides cool mist for up to 40 hours and has an auto shut-off. Experience the Vicks Difference –– use your humidifier with Vicks VapoSteam or Vicks VapoPads for extra soothing comfort.

name: MegaWise Healthy Top-Refill Cool Mist Humidifiers for Bedroom, 24dB Ultrasonic Air Vaporizer with Water Filter for Baby [PP Material], Colorful Night Light,1 Gal Essential Oil Diffuser, Auto Shut Off
short_description: Easy & Reliable Design – Features a durable dial control for precise mist adjustment, offering greater reliability than touch or button controls. Built with a solid structure to protect the electrical system, ensuring a longer lifespan compared to many other humidifiers. Anti-Leak Design & Essensial Oil Safe : Innovative design seperating the 3.5L large tank virtually impossible to leak; the flat bottom tank also make it super easy to refill water and clean every part of the water tank. Electric part is sperated from the water part securely to make this unit more durable. Water tank is made with materials that are essential oil safe. 7 color Light & Auto Shut-off : Soothing 7 color light to go with a joyful essential oils; or turn it off to enjoy a sound sleep. With a smart sensor, the humidifier will turn off by itself to prevent ultrasonic ceramic vaporizer from damage of dry burn. Goodbye to Wet Floor : Innovative design and highend nanomizer turns water into smaller molecules and blow them higher (up to 30 in) than other brands. No more wet carpet or floor from mist drop. MEGAWISE Quality & Support : MEGAWISE designs and manufactures products with the methodology of LEAN (adopted by Famous Brands such as Toyota and GE) to ensure the very high quality of products. Voice of Customer is contantly anaylized by its product team. Our 24*7 live chat support would confidently back any MEGAWISE products with a money back guarantee.
